body:
Hi guys, I know this is a bad news about it, for now I left Xencarch.  I unistall my TeamSpeak because i needed to save my MB and for all everything.  And most of all I can't just play all day. Cannot play Sunday Morning,Monday,Tuesday,Wensday,Thursday.
But at random time I do. Sorry Rylo for leaving and bye Xencarch. Good Luck in that Tournament :P

R.I.P. Xencarch Member (Supporter) 
Creafinity

title: Why I left Xencarch
